title: Episode #75: Are you a people pleaser?+ Why it's dangerous and how to stop
description:
In this episode I discuss the difference between people-pleasing & peace-making, how to identify if you are a people-pleaser, why it's dangerous, and how to stop people-pleasing for good.
Resources:THINK LEARN SUCCEED: https://store.drleaf.com/collections/frontpage/products/think-learn-succeed-bookTHE PERFECT YOU: https://store.drleaf.com/collections/frontpage/products/the-perfect-you
2019 Mental Health Summit: https://drleafconference.com
For more info on, and to join in my research project: https://www.drleafresearch.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
